phrases: We are going to lose anyway.
I guess I am just... no good without you, Koizumi.
I am just no good without you, Koizumi.
And so, summer vacation starts tomorrow.
What are you going to do over summer vacation?
The last summer of my high school life.
I still do not know how Otani feels, but...
I am going to have some fun!
You have forgotten you will be taking entrance exams soon, have not you?
For the little idiots I just named,
You have to work hard to make up for your past laziness.
You exam students do not get a summer vacation.
That is because they have study dates at the library every day.
But we will be attending summer classes, too.
And here I thought I would have the chance to have loads of fun...
What do you mean, loads of fun?
An idiot like you who misses all the important stuff,
What is got you so angry these days?!
So we have got to attend summer school again this year?
And here I thought I could have fun, now that I am done with the basketball club.
I though you resigned so that you could concentrate on your studies?
I guess it is not so bad.
Nobu-chan, why did not you plan study dates with Nakao-chi too?
I do not see why the one with red crosses all over her work should be asking me that.
What would you like to order?
A new item on the menu?
I am going to try it.
You are the one who is copying me.
I will go with the drink bar.
Chiharu-chan, that is a cute ring.
Did Suzuki-kun give it to you?
It was your birthday not long ago, was not it?
Oh, Nobu-chan, you got something for your birthday too, did not you?
Sorry it was only a cheap one.
It was given with love, after all.
That reminds me, it is almost Risa's birthday!
Otani-chi, naturally you will be giving Koizumi-san a present, will not you?
I mean, he just cannot live without Koizumi-san, right?
I did not say I could not live without her!
It is none of your business!
This is getting on my nerves!
For the customer who ordered the Polynesian Dancer...
What do you want for your birthday?
Are you refusing my good intentions?
More importantly, what were you talking about yesterday?
No one is telling me anything, and everyone seems to find it hilarious.
Just tell me what you want.
Do not complain to me later if I do not give you anything.
I told you I do not want anything!
Why do you always make things worse?!
I do not want a cute ring or a handbag.
The only thing I want is...
Come to think of it, on my birthday last year...
Saying a thing like that out of nowhere...
Well, I was not taken seriously, but...
It is been a whole year since then, huh?
Maybe someone like you is more suited to me.
I have had enough of this.
I am through with loving you!
I wonder if my hard work has paid off?
I mean, he just cannot live without Koizumi-san, right?
I never said I cannot live without her!
If you are going to buy something, hurry up and do it.
We are kind of out of place here.
I think she will be happy with anything you get her.
Do not give her Umibouzu stuff again.
Why should your boredom be my concern?
I hope something good happens on my birthday this year.
You have to attend summer classes too, Haruka?
I just wanted to see you.
Haruka-senpai may not look very smart,
An invitation to Koizumi Risa's Birthday Party?
We are going to prepare lots of delicious food and cake and host it!
Feel free to fall for me.
I will just win you over with my party hosting skills.
An invitation to Koizumi-senpai's birthday party.
I am inviting you because I do not have a choice.
Better this than having you two off alone somewhere.
Did you really have such an underhanded motive?
I am not going to let you have Risa all to yourself on her birthday.
Well, I want to celebrate with her too.
Nakao and Nobu-chan are both planning to go to your party, huh?
Maity-sensei is going to come too.
I thought you did not want me to do anything for your birthday?
You said you did not want a present from me.
I-I did not mean it like that!
Then what does cannot live without me mean?
I-I said I did not say that!
As if I would say that!
Did this happen when I fell asleep that time?
I-I told you, they got it all wrong!
I am seriously going to get those guys.
Happy birthday to you, happy birthday to you,
You sure had a long talk with our homeroom teacher.
What did he call you for?
Well, my test results were pretty terrible.
We thought he was with you.
Who cares if he is not here.
I did not do a thing!
This aggressive reaction is very suspicious.
You are the guest of honor today.
I put all of my love for you into this food, just to make you happy, Risa.
I made all your favorites: chirashizushi, fried chicken, sandwiches, takoyaki, french fries,
He is not answering his phone.
They are definitely both interested in each other now...
Even if Otani is not around, everyone else is here celebrating with me.
Hey, did you hear something from outside?
I heard there is a fireworks festival today.
If we go up to the roof, we should be able to see them.
Come to think of it, last year too...
Risa, let us go up to the roof.
I thought watching the fireworks would cheer you up.
If Otani's not with me, I just do not find the fireworks pretty...
I have already opened it, though...
I bought them at the convenience store.
Then let us get everyone and
Just put that away for now.
If they find out I bought you that,
Do not tell me you were late because you went to buy this?
Where did you go to get it?
I thought you were not going to come.
I was just thinking, I guess I am just no good without Otani.
I said the same thing after that last basketball match.
Although someone fell asleep and did not hear me.
I guess I am just... no good without you, Koizumi.
So... that was not a dream...
Cannot you pull a better face than that?
Do you have a fever again?
This is not a dream, right?
Why do not you buy me juice as penance?
The First Date is the Beginning of Misfortune!
The First Date is the Beginning of Misfortune!
